keyLocations.name: Banaro Island Town
keyLocations.description: A town on Banaro Island that was destroyed and absorbed by Blackbeard's Yami Yami no Mi powers during his demonstration.

keyEvents.title: Ace Arrives at Banaro Island
keyEvents.description: Ace arrives at Banaro Island to confront Blackbeard.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for the Duel on Banaro Island.

keyEvents.title: Duel on Banaro Island Begins
keyEvents.description: The battle between Ace and Blackbeard begins, with the entire island becoming the battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most consequential battles in One Piece history.

keyEvents.title: The Sun and Darkness Collide
keyEvents.description: The final clash between Ace's Dai Enkai: Entei and Blackbeard's darkness creates a massive explosion that nearly consumes all of Banaro Island.
keyEvents.significance: The island is devastated by the battle between two powerful Devil Fruit users.

statusHistory.reason: Nearly destroyed during the Duel on Banaro Island between Ace and Blackbeard

trivia.fact: Banaro Island is the location of the Duel on Banaro Island, which triggered the Summit War of Marineford.
The town on Banaro Island was consumed by Blackbeard's Black Hole technique during his demonstration of the Yami Yami no Mi's power.
The battle between Ace and Blackbeard nearly destroyed the entire island with the final clash of fire and darkness.
